# init(audioTimeStamp:sampleRate:)

**Initializer**

Creates an audio time object with the specified timestamp and sample rate.

## Declaration

```swift
init(audioTimeStamp ts: UnsafePointer<AudioTimeStamp>, sampleRate: Double)
```

## Parameters

- **ts**: The timestamp.
- **sampleRate**: The sample rate.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioTime] instance.

## Creating an Audio Time Instance

- **init(hostTime:)**: Creates an audio time object with the specified host time.
- **init(hostTime:sampleTime:atRate:)**: Creates an audio time object with the specified host time, sample time, and sample rate.
- **init(sampleTime:atRate:)**: Creates an audio time object with the specified timestamp and sample rate.
- **extrapolateTime(fromAnchor:)**: Creates an audio time object by converting between host time and sample time.
